channel.title: Choosing a Tech Stack on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Choosing a Tech Stack on Orange Academy

item.title: Paved Road
item.description: Knowing What Technology to Use When deciding to develop a thing, you’ll want an idea of what technologies you are going to use to develop and support that thing.

item.title: Choosing your Data Solution
item.description: Data Classification Before you choose a data service, you will need to understand the data classification under which the data for your application falls.

item.title: Messaging Options
item.description: PubSub Through Service Catalog What is Pub/Sub? Cloud Pub/Sub is a scalable, durable, event ingestion and delivery system that supports the publish-subscribe pattern at large and small scales.

item.title: Choosing a CICD Solution
item.description: CICD Options In addition to delivering value, we want to be able to be able to deliver quickly.
